SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often do you have mood swings?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - How Often Mood Swings

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you felt a need for higher doses of medication to treat your pain?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - Need Higher Doses of Medication

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you felt impatient with your doctors?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - Felt Impatient With Doctors

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you felt that things are just too overwhelming that you can't handle them?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - Felt That Things Are Overwhelming

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often is there tension in the home?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - How Often Tension at Home

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you counted pain pills to see how many are remaining?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - How Often Counted Pain Pills

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you been concerned that people will judge you for taking pain medication?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - Concerned People Will Judge You

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often do you feel bored?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - How Often Feel Bored

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SOAPR1-How Often Taken More Pain Med
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you taken more pain medication than you were supposed to?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - How Often Taken More Pain Medication

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you worried about being left alone?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - Worried About Being Left Alone

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you felt a craving for medication?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - Felt Craving for Medication

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have others expressed concern over your use of medication?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - Others Expressed Concern Over Medication Use

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have any of your close friends had a problem with alcohol or drugs?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - How Often Friends Had Problem

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have others told you that you had a bad temper?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - Others Told You Bad Temper

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SOAPR1-Felt Consumed to Get Pain Med
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you felt consumed by the need to get pain medication?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - Felt Consumed to Get Pain Medication

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: SOAPR1-Run Out of Pain Med Early
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you run out of pain medication early?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - Run Out of Pain Medication Early

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have others kept you from getting what you deserve?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - Others Kept You From what You Deserve

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often, in your lifetime, have you had legal problems or been arrested?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - Legal Problems or Arrested

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you attended an AA or NA meeting?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - Attended AA or NA Meeting

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you been in an argument that was so out of control that someone got hurt?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - Argument Where Someone Got Hurt

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you been sexually abused?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - How Often Sexually Abused

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have others suggested that you have a drug or alcohol problem?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - Others Suggested Drug or Alcohol Problem

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you had to borrow pain medications from your family or friends?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - How Often Borrowed Pain Medication

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you been treated for an alcohol or drug problem?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SOAPP-R - Treated for Alcohol or Drug Problem

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - Please include any additional information you wish about the above answers.
